title: Did Spotify get rid of saved songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Spotify music can be saved temporary if you are Spotify premium user, but what you saved are just the digital music files and only be allowed to play on Spotify app. Once you are not the premium user, you will cannot keep the music files. You can use a third party’s program if you want to download the real music files that will not miss after canceling the subscription. You can try TunePat Spotify Converter that converts Spotify music with 10X speed and keeps the original sound quality and metadata information. What’s more, it supports to convert Spotify music to MP3, AAC, WAV, and FLAC format, and all downloaded music can be transfer to other devices easily.
